law.catch_line: Licensees, credentialed holders, privilege holders, and applicants to cooperate with investigation.
law.text: A licensee, credentialed holder, privilege holder, or applicant who is the subject of an investigation by or on behalf of the board shall cooperate fully with the investigation, including responding to a complaint or lawful request for information in a materially factual and timely manner.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 25, effective July 15, 2010.
